snippet: Ray Allen won championships in Boston and Miami, made one of the most memorable shots in NBA Finals history and has more 3-pointers than anyone who ever played in the league....
lead_paragraph: Ray Allen won championships in Boston and Miami, made one of the most memorable shots in NBA Finals history and has more 3-pointers than anyone who ever played in the league.

headline.main: Ray Allen, the Top 3-Point Shooter in NBA History, Retires
headline.print_headline: Ray Allen, the Top 3-Point Shooter in NBA History, Retires
